Question: Robert "Bob" Hartley on the 1970s sitcom The ____ Show and then as innkeeper Dick Loudon on the 1980s sitcom this person.
Hints: This person ended in 1990 after eight seasons and 182 episodes.
This person played the President of the United States in a 1980 comedy, First Family.
This person "survived" his containment to help O'Brien present the Emmy Award for Best Comedy Series (which went to The Office).
